name: test_12_6_0_pin_unpin_community_post
description:
Test Case 254: Verify Pinning a Post
Test Case 255: Verify Post Pinned to Top of Community Thread
Test Case 256: Verify Unpinning a Post

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Postpartum community page
4. Create a new post with image
5. Publish the post and verify creation
6. Pin the post
7. Unpin the post
8. Verify pin/unpin functionality works correctly
descriptionHtml:
Test Case 254: Verify Pinning a Post
Test Case 255: Verify Post Pinned to Top of Community Thread
Test Case 256: Verify Unpinning a Post

Test Steps:

  1. Launch the browser
  2. Login as admin user
  3. Navigate to Postpartum community page
  4. Create a new post with image
  5. Publish the post and verify creation
  6. Pin the post
  7. Unpin the post
  8. Verify pin/unpin functionality works correctly
